snippet.title: Without Within 2 Trailer
snippet.description:
Vinty is attending a calligraphy event over in Melbourne. At last, she will be able to meet Excelia, the world famous calligrapher. Determined to study and mimic her idol's every move, will Vinty end up losing her identity?

Without Within 2 is the sequel to the free visual novel that is available on Steam:

http://store.steampowered.com/app/345650/

This sequel features links to real footage of Melbourne, so the game is an adventure as well as a tour. I will make those videos available for the public on YouTube.

Find out about Without Within 2 here:

http://wowi2.invertmouse.com

Thank you! I hope you will find the experience valuable.
